entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of showers. High 20. POP 30%
entry.summary: Sunny this morning then a mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of showers late this morning and this afternoon. Risk of a thunderstorm this afternoon. Fog patches dissipating this morning. High 20. UV index 7 or high. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Wednesday 10 May 2023
